name: Deepsea (itch) (crowcas)
description: A short, slightly spooky game about a scientist at the bottom of the ocean. Built by a three-person team in three weeks; I did all of the dialog, and coded the system to run it. It's possible on certain screens for the game to become unresponsive-- that's a bug outside of areas I worked on. I may attempt to fix it at some point, but the intro is playable.
